response.job_title: Front-End Developer | Civil Engineer | MSc Civil Engineering | BIM+VDC
response.summary:
Passionate Civil Engineer with a Master's degree in Construction Management. Currently studying to become a Front-End Developer, expanding my skill set to drive digital innovation in the construction/tech industry. Skilled in coordination, project management, BIM/VDC, and Renewable Energies. Expertise in financial monitoring of infrastructure projects, ensuring cost efficiency and timely delivery. Proficient in AutoCAD, Revit, and Navisworks. Seeking opportunities to apply my diverse skill set while honing my abilities in Front-end development. Strong communicator with an advanced command of English and intermediate fluency in French, facilitating effective communication and collaboration with international stakeholders.

Let's connect and explore how I can contribute to innovative projects and drive sustainable solutions!
response.skills: Detail Engineering, Construction Monitoring, Drainage, Engineering Design, Slack, Aurora Solar, Smartsheet, Solar PV Design, BricsCAD, Salesforce, Renewable Energy, Responsive Web Design, Problem Solving, Front-End Development, Collaborative Problem Solving, JavaScript, Building Information Modeling (BIM), GitHub, Web Development, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)

profile_positions.title: Contractor Engineer at Planning Consultant Office

profile_positions.description: Assistant to the Master's subject "Innovation and New Business in Construction" belonging to the Master of Civil Engineering and Construction Management program offered by Universidad de Los Andes, during the activities carried out in the corresponding academic semester
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

education.degree_name: MSc. in Civil Engineering with emphasis on Construction Management

company.name: Exactus Energy
company.description:
Exactus Energy is a professional services firm operating across the United States and Canada.  We offer a comprehensive collection of services for solar PV projects, including site survey, design, electrical and structural professional engineering, permit packages, and more.

Our team of experienced solar professionals are well versed in all aspects of on-site operations, design and engineering. Over the past 7+ years, Exactus Energy has designed hundreds of megawatts of solar, from residential and commercial rooftop installations to utility-scale ground mount arrays.

By handling the key technical aspects of a solar project, we create a simple, streamlined experience for our clients. We remove common delays and frustrations during the solar design process, allowing our clients to quickly move projects forward to installation.

We invite you to discover the benefits of partnering with Exactus Energy.  Contact us today.

exactusenergy.com/contact
